item.title: Report X-2024051042
item.description:
Report X-2024051042

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-21T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-17
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package arrived at hazmat during sunrise sort. Inspection showed package to be wet and leaking, from a crack along the bottom. Damage most likely from being dropped or mishandled during the loading process. Contents willl be disposed of, to prevent future leaking.

item.title: Report X-2024050916
item.description:
Report X-2024050916

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-21T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-16
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package arrived at hazmat cage during sunrise sort. Inspection showed package was wet with internal leakage, and 1 of 4 items had a loose cap. Damage most likely caused from being placed on the wrong conveyor belt. Remaining contents will be returned to shipper unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Report X-2024050653
item.description:
Report X-2024050653

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-20T15:12:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-12
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING THE OVERNIGHT THE PAKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION ONE BOTTLE OF AQUA BALANCE MURIATIC ACID WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKING FROM A LOOSE CAP. THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINE SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURN TO SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE.
